com.ryantenney.metrics.spring.config.annotation

Interface MetricsConfigurer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DelegatingMetricsConfiguration, MetricsConfigurerAdapter, MetricsConfigurerComposite

    public interface MetricsConfigurer
    Defines callback methods to customize the Java-based configuration for Spring Metrics enabled via @EnableMetrics.
    Since:
    3.0
    Author:
    Ryan Tenney
    See Also:
    EnableMetrics

    • Method Summary

      com.codahale.metrics.MetricRegistry getMetricRegistry()
      Override this method to provide a custom MetricRegistry.
